title: Budget Expense Type Add Schema
description: Schema for creating or updating a budget expense type

companyUuid.description: The UUID of the company to which the event belongs

entityId.description: The unique identifier of the entity associated with the budget expense type

reason.description: The reason for adding or updating the budget expense type

syncTime.description: The time when the budget expense type was synchronized

expenseTypeSyncGuid.description: The unique Sync GUID of the budget expense type being added or updated

budgetCategorySyncGuid.description: The unique Sync GUID of the budget category associated with the expense type

name.description: The name of the budget expense type being added or updated

featureTypeCode.description: The feature type code associated with the budget expense type

expenseTypeCode.description: The code of the budget expense type being added or updated

lastModifiedDate.description: The date and time when the budget expense type was last modified
